get.description: Gets the root cause analysis diagram

parameters.name: title
parameters.description: create an appropriate title for the problem

parameters.name: description
parameters.description: what the problem is to generate the root cause analysis diagram for

parameters.name: fileString
parameters.description: the return value of the 'encrypt' function from 'encrypt.py' under knowledge, passing the path to the csv file as the parameter in the 'encrypt' function
